cn.edu.hfut.dmic.webcollector.crawler

类 CommonCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • cn.edu.hfut.dmic.webcollector.crawler.Crawler
      • cn.edu.hfut.dmic.webcollector.crawler.CommonCrawler
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    DbUpdaterFactory, RequestFactory, ParserFactory
    直接已知子类:
    BreadthCrawler, RedisCrawler

    public abstract class CommonCrawler
extends Crawler
    一种常用的广度遍历爬虫
    作者:
    hu
